data.title: L. Sprague de Camp
data.meta_description: Lyon Sprague de Camp, (November 27 1907, New York City â€“ November 6 2000, Plano, Texas) was an American science fiction and fantasy author. In a writer career spanning fifty years he wrote over 100 novels, along with notable works of nonfiction, including biographies of other important fantasy...
